long_description: The oversized, best-selling Farrah Polarized Sunglasses from Spy look stunning on faces of all shapes and sizes as they protect eyes from harmful UV rays. Black nylon frames have bronze polarized lenses with a black mirror finish. Impact-resistant polycarbonate polarized lenses block glare and 100% of harmful UV rays. Lightweight nylon frames allow for an even weight distribution across the nose. Spy's Happy Lens(TM) technology enhances color and contrast. Spy Farrah Polarized Sunglasses feature a unique tapered shape to provide optically correct, distortion-free viewing at all angles.
short_description: The oversized, best-selling Farrah Polarized Sunglasses from Spy look stunning on faces of all shapes and sizes as they protect eyes from harmful UV rays.
